segments.text: Is this the baggage claim area for flight KB256 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are on the same plane .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I am a transfer passenger . I have a connecting flight to Miami .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you have to bring your baggage to the transfer check-in area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not go and find a porter ?
segments.speaker: S2
